description:
When Yuma`s Heart Pieces are swiped by a pack of stray dogs, Cathy calls on her feline friends to help hunt them down!   After finding the hounds` hideout, Cathy is challenged by the pack leader to a duel!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Shukumei no Taiketsu! Cat-chan vs Dog-chan
The Destined Showdown! Cat vs Dog
宿命の対決! キャットちゃんVSドッグちゃん
